gocept.thermosnake
******************

gocept.thermosnake is a nagios check script to use with the thermosnake usb hardware ("solder skills required":http://www.elektor.com/magazines/2008/june/thermo-snake.495081.lynkx). It requires the "measuretemp" program, which can be downloaded in sourcecode "here":http://www.elektor.com/products/books/computer/embedded-linux-enhanced-edition.1706867.lynkx
